author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Twenty-Two! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

From the moment this one got put on the Patron Poll I knew it was going to jump the line. This Neon-Grim-Dark apocalypse of mutating radioactive Punks jettisoning toxic Bile on each other is exactly the sort of nonsense the GMG community is here for. Let's dive in. 

Check out the PUKEAPOCALYPSE Rulebook HERE: https://www.exaltedfuneral.com/products/pukeapocalypse
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 022 - PUKEAPOCALYPSE by Exalted Funderal & Glenn Ford
